translation.en: I thought they took care of that.
What, student body president isn't enough for you?
translation.it: Rappresentante studentesca non ti basta? Fai anche il supervisore, Cassandra?

translation.en: -Now you're hall monitor, too, Cassandra? -We're on in a minute, Harry.
translation.it: Rappresentante studentesca non ti basta? Fai anche il supervisore, Cassandra? Inizia tra un minuto, Harry.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Eighty-five in a row. Beating the record.
translation.it: - Testa 85 volte di fila. Record battuto! - Un nuovo record?

translation.en: [Cassandra] A new record. Is that as far as you're prepared to go?
translation.it: - Testa 85 volte di fila. Record battuto! - Un nuovo record? Non sei disposto ad andare oltre?

translation.en: -You spun them yourself. -Not a flicker of doubt?
translation.it: - Le hai lanciate tu. - Nessun dubbio?

translation.en: I could never ever do that.
translation.it: Io non riuscirei mai a farlo.

translation.en: Ooh. Re-gifted flowers for the assistant stage manager?
translation.it: Fiori di seconda mano per l'assistente di scena?

translation.en: The best stage manager in the whole world.
[whispers] You should tell him how you feel.
Okay, but don't be late. Guys?
translation.it: Ok, ma non fare tardi. Ragazzi?

translation.en: You need us to bring anything tonight, dude?
Hey, bring some vodka tonight. It's BYOB.
translation.it: Ognuno porta da bere. Tu prendi la vodka.

translation.en: So nice of you to invite everyone. Would you even come, Cassandra?
translation.it: - Carino da parte tua aver invitato tutti. - Tu verresti?

translation.en: Is that really the point, Harry?
translation.it: È davvero quello il punto, Harry?

translation.en: It's not for the play. It's for people who are helping out with prom.
translation.it: Non è per il teatro, è per chi organizza il ballo.

translation.en: But if you want to come...
It's okay. I'll see you tomorrow.
Oh, by the way, Cassandra, you were really, really great tonight.
translation.it: Stasera sei stata davvero grande, Cassandra.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you so much when you go up to Yale.
translation.it: Mi mancherai, quando andrai a Yale.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, on a stage, in an auditorium. For people to come and see.
translation.it: Sì, su un palco, davanti a un pubblico.

translation.en: Did you see this week's check yet?
It was supposed to be here today.
Might be a state budget thing, you know.
translation.it: Sarà per via del budget del governo.

translation.en: I'm not the goddamn Red Cross.
-[Harry] Hey. -You can't go in there now, Harry.
What are you two doing here? You need something?
translation.it: Che fate qui? Vi serve qualcosa?

translation.en: Okay, I have a town meeting in 20 minutes. I'll see you at home after?
translation.it: Ho una riunione tra 20 minuti. Ci vediamo a casa?

translation.en: All we know is, there was a smell, it went away, and now it's back.
translation.it: Sappiamo solo che si sentiva un odore, è andato via e ora è tornato.

translation.en: The committee of selectmen have asked the federal government for help.
translation.it: Il consiglio comunale ha chiesto aiuto al governo federale.

translation.en: The EPA and the Department of the Interior will begin testing this week.
translation.it: I test dell'EPA e del Ministero degli Interni inizieranno in settimana.

translation.en: there's no reason to suspect that this stink poses any health hazard.
translation.it: Non c'è motivo di sospettare che questa puzza sia una minaccia per la salute.

translation.en: But if anyone wants to use this as a cue to get out of Dodge for the week, personal choice.
translation.it: Ma se qualcuno vuole andare via per una settimana, è una sua scelta.

translation.en: And, of course, our senior high school, kids over the age of 16 are going to be the guest of the National Park Service
translation.it: E i liceali che hanno più di 16 anni saranno ospiti dei Parchi Nazionali

translation.en: who will bus them to the Great Smoky Mountains for a week's camping.
translation.it: e andranno in campeggio alle Great Smoky Mountains.

translation.en: All right, last one for a week. We don't wanna start a forest fire.
translation.it: È l'ultima. Non voglio dare fuoco alla foresta.

translation.en: -[boy] Graffiti. -Yeah, I know it's graffiti, man,
translation.it: Sono graffiti. Sì, questo lo so,

translation.en: but when was the last time you guys saw graffiti in this town?
translation.it: ma quando mai avete visto dei graffiti a scuola?

translation.en: It's the writing on the wall.
-[boy] Yeah, no duh. -That's what it's called.
"The writing on the wall"? From the Bible, the Book of Daniel.
translation.it: "La scritta sul muro", dalla Bibbia, Libro di Daniele.

translation.en: -Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin. -Why do you always know shit I don't know?
It means, "You've been weighed in the balance and found wanting."
translation.it: "Sei stato pesato sulla bilancia e trovato mancante."

translation.en: someone was definitely fucking high last night.
translation.it: ...che qualcuno era proprio fatto ieri notte.

translation.en: [in sign language] Dad wanted to make sure we brought our toothbrushes, did you...
translation.it: Papà chiede se abbiamo portato lo spazzolino, hai...

translation.en: -It's just a shirt. -Half a shirt. And not for school.
translation.it: - È una camicetta. - Mezza. E non è adatta.

translation.en: -You have no idea. -Of course I do. I have a mother.
translation.it: - Non sai quanto. - Certo che sì. Ho una madre.

translation.en: -Um, okay, I'm gonna-- -All right, have fun.
Do you mind if I, uh, sit here?
translation.it: Ti dispiace se mi siedo qui?

translation.en: Rock slides, the road is closed. You're back home.
translation.it: Una frana ha chiuso la strada. Si torna a casa.
Penso che siamo di nuovo a casa.

translation.en: doesn't look like anyone was expecting us.
translation.it: Non si aspettavano che saremmo tornati.

translation.en: My mom's phone, it just keeps ringing.
-You're not going to wait for me? -[Campbell chuckles]
Can I crash with you tonight? It's too far back to my place.
translation.it: Posso stare da te? Casa mia è troppo lontana.

translation.en: Mom, I'm back home. They-- They brought us back.
translation.it: Mamma, sono a casa. Ci hanno riportati indietro.

translation.en: -My mom must've left town with my sister. -Same here.
translation.it: - Mamma e mia sorella sono fuori città. - Idem.

translation.en: But their cars are still in the driveway. It's fucking weird.
translation.it: Ma le loro macchine sono qui. È strano.

translation.en: Fuck. I don't think I have any data.
No one. Nowhere. And the storm must have knocked out our data.
translation.it: Nessuno. La tempesta avrà messo fuori uso Internet.

translation.en: Hey, so who decided that we needed a flash mob?
translation.it: Chi ha deciso che serviva un flash mob?

translation.en: What the fuck, Cassandra? [Cassandra] Better than 200 people sending texts.
translation.it: - Che cazzo, Cassandra? - Meglio di 200 persone che messaggiano.

translation.en: Has anyone been able to reach anyone?
And there was a miscommunication, and we were brought back here by mistake.
translation.it: C'è stato un fraintendimento e ci hanno riportati qui per sbaglio.

translation.en: Someone would still answer a phone.
I don't know, maybe there's some place with no reception.
translation.it: Forse sono in un posto dove non c'è segnale.

translation.en: In the morning, someone will answer a phone.
Maybe it's not safe for us to be here, if they all left.
translation.it: Forse qui non siamo al sicuro, se sono andati via tutti.

translation.en: A couple hours isn't gonna make a difference.
translation.it: Un paio d'ore non faranno differenza.

translation.en: We'll figure this all out in the morning.
Yeah, we should go home. And anyone who doesn't want to...
translation.it: Sì, andiamo a casa. E chi non vuole...

translation.en: uh, be alone can come back to our house. Yeah?
translation.it: ...stare solo può venire a casa nostra.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, Harry, yeah. Just go to sleep.
No, I don't care what Cassandra says. Cassandra doesn't know everything.
translation.it: No, non m'importa che dice Cassandra. Cassandra non sa tutto.

translation.en: I-- Yeah, no, I get that, Gwen, and maybe your mom and dad would do something like this,
translation.it: Ho capito, Gwen, e forse i tuoi farebbero una cosa così,

translation.en: but my mom doesn't leave her house unless you drag her out by her hair and...
translation.it: ma mia madre non esce di casa a meno che non la trascini per i capelli.

translation.en: -[sighs] And even then, she-- -You're being paranoid, Lex.
translation.it: - E anche se... - Sei paranoica, Lex.

translation.en: Your mom left because of the smell, like Cassandra said.
translation.it: È andata via per la puzza, come ha detto Cassandra.

translation.en: It's the only thing that makes sense.
So, let's just forget about it tonight.
No, no, I'm not gonna go to some party, all right? You go.
translation.it: Non voglio andare a una festa, ok? Vai tu.

translation.en: I got to go take a pee.
The whole place is open, man. Just go right here. In public?
translation.it: - Non c'è niente di aperto. Falla qui. - In pubblico?

translation.en: Who's gonna remember in the morning?
Shut the fuck up. Can you fucking leave?
translation.it: Chiudi il becco. - Perché non te ne vai? - È un'amica.

translation.en: -[Harry] She's just my friend. -[girl] Um, I would, but--
translation.it: - Perché non te ne vai? - È un'amica. Lo farei, ma...

translation.en: Hey, Kel. I can explain everything. Kel!
[in sign language] I can't sign and shoot.
translation.it: Non posso fare i segni e filmare.

translation.en: Why don't you ever join in?
Hey, why are you spoiling all the fun?
Is it like a ballerina thing?
Apart from the fact that you were drying her tits?
translation.it: Oltre al fatto che le stavi asciugando le tette?

translation.en: I didn't mean anything by it.
You don't mean anything by anything.
I was just trying to have a little bit of fun. I mean, it's not like we own each other.
translation.it: Volevo divertirmi un po'. Non siamo padroni l'una dell'altro.

translation.en: No. I mean, you know what I mean.
She doesn't really believe in this kind of thing, you know?
translation.it: Non crede molto in questo tipo di cose, sai?

translation.en: It's always a lot less fun than you think it's gonna be.
translation.it: È sempre meno divertente del previsto.

translation.en: I have a confession to make. Well, this isn't a Catholic Church. [laughs]
translation.it: - Devo confessare una cosa. - Questa non è una chiesa cattolica.

translation.en: You can't just do that, you know?
translation.it: Non puoi fare una cosa così, ok?

translation.en: Once it was so cold, my pee froze on the way down.
translation.it: Una volta era così freddo che mi si è gelata la pipì.

translation.en: Oh, I wish I'd been there.
[Grizz] The writing on the wall, it's gone.
Yeah, of course it is. They cleaned it up.
We're completely cut off from the world.
There's no cable Wi-Fi. Go check your modem.
translation.it: Non c'è wi-fi. Controlla il tuo modem.

translation.en: Try your parents' satellite TV. Nothing.
translation.it: Prova la TV satellitare dei tuoi. Niente.

translation.en: And you really want to freak yourself out?
It's all fucked up. We can talk to each other, but...
translation.it: È un casino. Tra di noi possiamo parlare, ma...

translation.en: it's like there's nothing beyond this place.
translation.it: È come se non ci fosse niente oltre questo posto.

translation.en: I'll get a car and go to Greenwich to get help.
translation.it: Prendo un'auto e vado a chiedere aiuto a Greenwich.

translation.en: Someone has to find out where everyone went.
Luke, you want to see if we can get some of the guys to come with?
translation.it: Luke, vediamo se vuole venire qualcun altro?

translation.en: Okay, so as a rule, the more bizarre a thing seems,
translation.it: Di regola, più una cosa sembra bizzarra

translation.en: -I don't know this shit. -How about Sherlock Holmes?
translation.it: - Non so niente. - E Sherlock Holmes?

translation.en: The point is, there's an explanation for everything.
What does that have to do with the Arthur Conan Boyle dude?
translation.it: E che c'entra quell'Arthur Conan Boyle?

translation.en: [Luke] What the fuck is going on?
I mean, there's only so many options.
Maybe this is just some elaborate fucking game.
translation.it: Forse questo è un qualche... elaborato gioco del cazzo.

translation.en: Like, someone built an exact replica of our town
translation.it: Hanno costruito una copia esatta della nostra città

translation.en: and just put in the middle of nowhere, and if we just walk...
translation.it: e l'hanno messa in mezzo al nulla. Se camminiamo...

translation.en: like, this way or that way or any way,
translation.it: ...da quella parte, o di qua o...

translation.en: eventually we'll get back to the...
I'm not saying it makes any sense.
and it came back, and the buses came for us.
translation.it: ed è tornata. Gli autobus sono venuti a prenderci.

translation.en: You're gonna just work this out, Cassandra? Like some logic problem?
translation.it: Risolverai la situazione, Cassandra? Come un problema di logica?

translation.en: I mean, not a flicker of a doubt?
The world doesn't just turn upside down without a reason.
translation.it: Il mondo non va sottosopra senza un motivo.
Non è una recita dentro la recita.

translation.en: Okay? Clever is not the same thing as true.
translation.it: La soluzione geniale non è quella vera.

translation.en: There is a point to everything, there are answers.
translation.it: Tutto ha un significato. Ci sono delle risposte.

translation.en: God doesn't just play games with people for fun.
translation.it: Dio non gioca con le persone per divertimento.

translation.en: All right, look, Grizz and I will get a group together
translation.it: Ok, io e Grizz formeremo un gruppo

translation.en: and we'll go hike out here through the woods, okay? Like a search party.
translation.it: per oltrepassare la foresta, come una squadra di ricerca.

translation.en: I think that's a good idea.

translation.it: - Certo. - Grizz sa quello che fa.

translation.en: And if there's people out there, we gotta find 'em, right?
translation.it: Se c'è gente là fuori, li troveremo, no?

translation.en: Yeah, I got a house with a refrigerator with food inside of it,
translation.it: Sì. Ho una casa con un frigorifero pieno di cibo

translation.en: and I'm gonna go eat it.
Well, what are we supposed to do instead?
We have to figure out what is happening to us.
translation.it: Dobbiamo capire che ci sta succedendo.

translation.en: You're not student council president anymore.
translation.it: Non sei più la rappresentante degli studenti.

translation.en: God, you really, really need to get over that.
Jesus Christ, just get in the car.

translation.it: Va bene. Chi se ne frega?

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -[car engine starts]
-I'm just gonna send a text. -[shutter clicks] -Let everybody know how fucked we are. -Campbell!
translation.it: Mando un messaggio per far sapere a tutti quanto siamo fottuti.

translation.en: Come on, let's think about this.
[woman] Hi, you've reached the office of Amanda Pressman.
translation.it: Salve, avete chiamato l'ufficio di Amanda Pressman.

translation.en: At the sound of the tone, please--
[man] Hi, you've reached Jim Pressman's phone. Sorry I can't answer your--
translation.it: È la segreteria telefonica di Jim Pressman. Ora non posso...

translation.en: [Amanda] You've reached the Pressman residence. Please leave a message after the--
translation.it: Salve, avete chiamato casa Pressman. Lasciate un mess...

translation.en: I just needed to talk to someone.
You're really not talking to me?
What I did is not the worst crime in the world,
translation.it: Non è stato il reato più grave del mondo.

translation.en: and given everything, can't I get a tiny break?
translation.it: Date le circostanze, puoi darmi un po' di tregua?

translation.en: [girl] Are you serious? Can I have a bag?
translation.it: - Sul serio? Puoi darmi una busta? - No.

translation.en: -But there's none left, Elle. -That's not my problem.
translation.it: - Sono finite, Elle. - Non è un problema mio.

translation.en: You ever see that movie The Poseidon Adventure?
translation.it: Hai visto il film L'avventura del Poseidon?

translation.en: It's about a cruise ship and it capsizes,
translation.it: Una nave da crociera si capovolge

translation.en: and the captain, he comes into this big, upside-down ballroom,
translation.it: e il capitano entra in un salone sottosopra

translation.en: he tells everybody to stay where they are, that they're gonna be rescued.
translation.it: e dice a tutti di restare lì, che verranno salvati.

translation.en: And-- And six of them, they decide to climb up,
translation.it: E sei di loro decidono di arrampicarsi,

translation.en: to the bottom of the ship.
And some of them live, and no one else does.
translation.it: Alcuni di loro sopravvivono, ma nessun altro.

translation.en: And ever since I watched it, I always wondered...
translation.it: Da quando l'ho visto, mi sono sempre chiesta...

translation.en: You know, like, who am I in this story? Am I the one who has to...
translation.it: Chi sono io nella storia? Sono quella che deve...

translation.en: you know, die so that everyone else lives?
Am I the one who turns out weaker than expected?
Am I the one who's only doing the best when the going is good?
translation.it: Sono quella che si impegna solo se le cose vanno bene?

translation.en: I know I'm not the heroine.
I'm telling you, the one that you are right now...
translation.it: Ti dico solo che quella che sei ora...

translation.en: you don't want to be that one.
Do you have, like, a drug problem or something?
Depends on what you mean by that.
Can you take me home? I have to go home.
Cassandra, what's... What's going on right now?

translation.it: Ho un difetto congenito al cuore.

translation.en: I ditched my check-up for this trip.
translation.it: Ho saltato il controllo per andare in gita.

translation.en: I don't know where I put my pills.
translation.it: Non so dove ho messo le pillole.

translation.en: -I'm gonna fucking die. -Come on, don't say that.
We'll break into the pharmacy, even if we have to blow it up.
translation.it: Entreremo nella farmacia, anche facendola saltare.

translation.en: What if things don't go back to the way they were?
translation.it: E se le cose non tornano come prima?

translation.en: -'Course they're gonna go back the way-- -Don't give me a fucking speech, Gordie.
translation.it: - Certo che torneranno... - Non farmi un discorso, Gordie.

translation.en: Look, okay, if it turns out we're stuck here,
translation.it: Se si scopre che siamo bloccati qui,

translation.en: If we can't go back home, if this is our new home, then...
translation.it: Se non possiamo tornare a casa e questa è la nostra nuova casa...

translation.en: then I'll learn how to take care of you.
I can study. There's still a hospital.
You have to stay alive, or else we're all fucked.
translation.it: Devi restare viva, sennò siamo fottuti.

translation.en: [Grizz] Okay, so five days' worth of food,
and that should be enough to get us past Greenwich, Stamford,
translation.it: Dovrebbero bastare per superare Greenwich, Stamford

translation.en: and all the way up to New Haven.
-I don't understand. -[Harry] It was my mother's.
translation.it: Non capisco. Era di mia madre.

translation.en: -I need to go. -[stammers] She was fucking someone.
My dad hasn't even been dead six months.
translation.it: Papà è morto meno di sei mesi fa.

translation.en: But what does that matter now?
How is finding some shit about our parents going to make things better?
translation.it: A che serve scoprire della roba sui nostri genitori?

translation.en: It was an insurance policy that my father left for me and my sister,
translation.it: Un'assicurazione che mio padre ha lasciato a me e mia sorella,

translation.en: in case things go to shit.

translation.it: Ma chi se ne importa dell'oro?

translation.en: All you can do is have an advantage and this is mine, this is the only one that I have. Okay?
translation.it: Puoi solo avere un vantaggio e questo è il mio, l'unico che ho.

translation.en: We don't own each other, remember?
translation.it: Non siamo i padroni l'una dell'altro.

translation.en: Why should I trust you today,
translation.it: Perché dovrei fidarmi di te oggi,

translation.en: if I couldn't trust you yesterday?
You have to stick with your own.
It's just a chunk of metal, Harry.
translation.it: È solo un pezzo di metallo.

translation.en: I don't think that's gonna matter now.
-Thank you. -[girl] Who's got the peanut butter?
translation.it: - Grazie. - Dov'è il burro di noccioline?

translation.en: -Is it still in the pack? -I'll get it.
translation.it: - È nello zaino? - Lo prendo io.

translation.en: -What the fuck? Fuck! -[girl] What just happened?
-[Emily] Fucking bit me! -[Grizz] Hey, clear the area.
translation.it: - Cos'è successo? - Mi ha morso! Fate spazio. Facciamola sdraiare.

translation.en: -Would you lie her down? Careful. -[Emily] Shit, shit, shit, shit! Ow!
translation.it: Fate spazio. Facciamola sdraiare. - Cazzo! - Attenzione.

translation.en: -[Grizz] All right, just lie her down. -Yeah.
Fucking shit, it hurts so much!
Let's try-- Hey, I'm gonna try to calm you down. All right?
translation.it: Ora proverò a farti calmare, ok? Voglio rallentarti il battito.

translation.en: You wanna slow your heart rate down. So, deep breaths.
translation.it: Ora proverò a farti calmare, ok? Voglio rallentarti il battito. Respira profondamente.

translation.en: That's good, okay. So, squeeze my hand.
Big squeeze. Think we can get some packs?
Put it beneath the back of her head, we want her heart above it.
translation.it: Mettiglielo sotto la testa. Il cuore deve stare in alto.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's a good-- that's a good bite.
translation.it: Ok, va bene... È un bel morso.

translation.en: -Okay. -Is it supposed to hurt this much? -[Luke] Only if you're lucky. -[Emily chuckles]
translation.it: - È normale che faccia così male? - Solo se sei fortunata.

translation.en: [Luke] Don't worry, Grizz knows what he's doing, all right?
translation.it: Tranquilla, Grizz sa quello che fa.

translation.en: -Okay, let it out. -[Luke] It's gonna be a badass scar.
translation.it: - Butta fuori. - Ti resterà una bella cicatrice.

translation.en: Everybody else all right? You guys good?
If you pick up, I'll explain.
So you're not afraid I'm alive.
We just want to be with you at home.
translation.it: Vogliamo solo stare a casa con te.

translation.en: You know how you said everyone we go to school with is an asshole?
translation.it: Sai quando hai detto che gli altri sono tutti stronzi?

translation.en: Well, nobody is feeling well, Cassandra.
I'm serious. I can't find my medicine.
translation.it: Dico sul serio. Non trovo la mia medicina.

translation.en: Your medicine's-- Your medicine's in my bag.
translation.it: La tua medicina è nella mia borsa.

translation.en: Yeah, I took it for you. I thought maybe you'd forgotten it.
translation.it: Credevo che te la fossi scordata.

translation.en: [Allie] Yeah. Yeah, I'll get it for you.
But then you need to get out there and you need to do something,
translation.it: Ma poi devi andare lì fuori a fare qualcosa.

translation.en: because there's like a hundred scared-shitless idiots running around.
translation.it: Ci sono un centinaio di idioti che si cagano sotto.

translation.en: -No one wants to hear anything from me. -Fuck that, Cassandra, you're here.
translation.it: - Nessuno vuole ascoltarmi. - Al diavolo, Cassandra.

translation.en: -Me, too. -And I have to take care of myself.
translation.it: - Anch'io. - Devo prendermi cura di me.

translation.en: And I need you take care of me.
translation.it: Ho bisogno che ti prendi cura di me.

translation.en: I live in your shadow for 17 fucking years...
translation.it: Ho vissuto nella tua ombra per 17 fottuti anni...

translation.en: and now you want to disappear?
Just go get my medicine, Allie.
Glasberg tried to barbecue in his own room and...
translation.it: Glasberg ha acceso il barbecue in camera sua
e ha dato fuoco alla casa.

translation.en: I'd have voted him most likely to do that.
I don't know where I'm going.

translation.it: Non c'è un posto dove andare.

translation.en: break into a restaurant and steal some food and hang out.
translation.it: ...rubare del cibo in un ristorante e mangiare insieme.

translation.en: Look, I just want to help.
So what? That's what I want.
translation.it: E allora? È quello che voglio.

translation.en: Since the day I moved here.
translation.it: Da quando mi sono trasferito qui.

translation.en: It's not a very good time. In case you haven't noticed,
translation.it: Non è un buon momento. Non so se hai notato,

translation.en: -the whole world just turned upside down. -I noticed, okay? Believe me.
translation.it: - ma il mondo è a soqquadro. - L'ho notato, davvero.

translation.en: Today feels like the first day in my whole life
translation.it: Oggi sembra il primo giorno della mia vita

translation.en: Now what does he have that I don't have?
translation.it: Cos'ha lui che io non ho?

translation.en: We're in Connecticut, man. What the fuck? There's no fucking cobras here.
translation.it: Siamo in Connecticut. Non ci sono cobra qui.

translation.en: But we're three hours from anywhere. And I have no idea what to...
translation.it: Ma siamo a tre ore da qualsiasi posto. E non so proprio...

translation.en: Fuck. What-- What the fuck does that mean?
Her body's shutting down, she's suffocating.
translation.it: Il suo corpo sta cedendo, sta soffocando.

translation.en: What... I made her do it, dude.
translation.it: Cosa... L'ho convinta io a venire.

translation.en: You should tell everybody so they're prepared.
What the fuck does that mean? Are you giving up, Grizz?
translation.it: Che cazzo significa? Ti arrendi, Grizz?

translation.en: Luke, we're so fucking in over our heads here. Jesus fucking Christ, man.
translation.it: - Siamo nei guai fino al collo. - Cristo santo!

translation.en: H-hey, I don't think she's breathing.
-I don't think she's-- -Give her mouth-to-mouth, just--
-I don't know how to-- Okay! -Just do it, just blow!
translation.it: - Non so come... - Fallo e basta!
Inclinale la testa. - Indietro. - Tappale il naso.

translation.en: -You have to tilt her head back. -[boy] Block her nose.
-Put your fingers over her nose! -Look, I'm doing the best I can!
translation.it: - Con le dita! - Sto facendo del mio meglio!

translation.en: -[boy] I don't know. I don't think so. -[girl] That's not how you do it. Shit.
translation.it: - Il cuore batte? - Non penso. Non si fa così. Cazzo!

translation.en: No, you can't do that while I'm doing this! It's not gonna work!
translation.it: Non puoi, mentre faccio così! - Non funzionerà! - Togliti!
- Non funzionerà! - Togliti! - Mi hai detto... - Ora ti sto dicendo di non farlo!

translation.en: And now I'm telling you not to, okay?!
translation.it: - Mi hai detto... - Ora ti sto dicendo di non farlo!

translation.en: Come on, Emily, stay with us. Come on!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
We need to decide whether to bury her here or take her home.
translation.it: Dobbiamo decidere se seppellirla o portarla a casa.

translation.en: The rest is out of our hands.
No, no, no. Fuck that. No, we can do this. Come on.
I want to know why we're here.
And why this place is exactly like home?
translation.it: E perché questo posto è uguale a casa.

translation.en: And the lights still go on?
[laughs] And our cell phones still work.
[in sign language] What if there is no why?
translation.it: E se non ci fosse un perché?
O salvati o non so che altro.

translation.en: I mean, there's a story here.
Apparently they do. You go missing, you go deaf for no reason.
translation.it: A quanto pare sì. Puoi sparire. Diventi sordo senza motivo.

translation.en: You're looking for answers.There are none.
translation.it: Cerchi delle risposte. Non ce ne sono.
Questo non ne è la prova?

translation.en: You know what? Something happened yesterday.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Ieri è successo qualcosa.

translation.en: I have to find out why.
-[Grizz] Need me to take her for a while? -[Luke] No, I'm all right.
translation.it: La porto io per un po'? No, sto bene.

translation.en: the writing on the wall from before we left.
'Cause that's exactly how God would do it.
I just got a bar of reception.
Just tell her to spread the word, and have everybody meet at the church.
translation.it: Dille di spargere la voce e di far venire tutti alla chiesa.

translation.en: They must be headed back here.
That's why he wanted us together. So fast.
translation.it: - Per questo ci hanno fatti riunire. - Ci hanno messo poco.

translation.en: Twelve hours. Maybe they found something.
Or maybe they found nothing. Why wouldn't he say if it was good news?
translation.it: O niente. Perché non dire di avere buone notizie?

translation.en: there are some things that we ought to figure out.
translation.it: ci sono delle cose che dobbiamo decidere.

translation.en: Before we rip this place apart and maybe...
translation.it: Prima che facciamo tutto a pezzi e magari...

translation.en: you know, start hurting each other.
I don't know what the hell is going on.
translation.it: Non so che diavolo sta succedendo.

translation.en: Maybe Luke will come back with some good news.
translation.it: Forse Luke ci porterà buone notizie.

translation.en: Yeah, why don't we just wait and see, Cassandra?
Because I would rather prepare for the worst before the worst happens.
translation.it: Perché vorrei prepararmi al peggio prima che il peggio arrivi.

translation.en: I don't know specifically, but I think it means...
translation.it: Non lo so con esattezza, ma penso che significhi...

translation.en: we agree not to just take things
translation.it: Impegniamoci a non prendere le cose

translation.en: Until all the food is gone and...
translation.it: così che il cibo non finirà e non...

translation.en: Jesus, man, what is your problem?
What are we agreeing to, Cassandra?
Which one of us gets to decide who gets what?
translation.it: Chi decide a chi spetta cosa?

translation.en: How do you want to decide things?
Every person for themselves? Then we're back to where we started.
translation.it: Ognuno per conto suo? Siamo al punto di partenza.

translation.en: Maybe you want to flip a coin to see who decides?
-[sighs] -[Cassandra] You don't like democracy? How about random fucking chance?
translation.it: Non ti piace la democrazia? Che ne dici di lasciare tutto al caso?

translation.en: -I'm-- I'm not gonna do that. -Okay, okay. I'll call it for you.
translation.it: - Non lo farò. - Ok. Lo faccio io per te.

translation.en: There's no civilization here, not until we start one.
translation.it: Qui non c'è civiltà, a meno che non ne creiamo una noi.

translation.en: So what are we gonna do?
First, I think we have no choice but to share.
translation.it: Intanto penso che non ci resti altra scelta

translation.en: Really? How much electricity do we have? Until it's all used up and everything goes dark?
translation.it: Davvero? Quanta elettricità abbiamo prima che finisca e rimaniamo al buio?

translation.en: I think 225 people in 200 houses doesn't make sense.
translation.it: Penso che non abbia senso che 225 persone stiano in 200 case.

translation.en: [boy] Keep what's ours! [Cassandra] What is yours? Do you have money?
translation.it: - Teniamoci le nostre cose! - Che cos'è tuo? Hai dei soldi?

translation.en: The things that you need to live: food, clothes, the stuff in stores,
translation.it: Le cose che servono per vivere: il cibo, i vestiti, la merce dei negozi

translation.en: Are we going to fight each other over food?
And some of us have things that others want.
translation.it: E qualcuno ha delle cose che altri vogliono.

translation.en: Right, Harry. I have no house.
translation.it: È vero, Harry. Non ho una casa.

translation.en: The place that I used to live in
is outside of town, it doesn't exist.
translation.it: è fuori città e non esiste.

translation.en: You want me to just live on the streets?
You can live wherever you want.
I don't have to listen to this. Not anymore. Harry, this has nothing to do with you--
translation.it: - Non voglio più starvi a sentire... - Questo non riguarda te...

translation.en: No one elected you king, cousin.
translation.it: Nessuno ti ha eletta re, cugina.

translation.en: Did anybody vote for her? Did they?
Anybody elect her to speak on your behalf?
translation.it: Qualcuno l'ha scelta per parlare per voi?

translation.en: I don't want to be king.
That's not what it looks like.
I've thought a lot about dying.
I've almost gotten used to that.
But I don't like to be afraid.
translation.it: Ma non mi piace aver paura.

translation.en: I don't want to shoot you.
We'll be back when Luke gets here.
Until then, if anybody else is tired of listening to her,
translation.it: Fino ad allora, se qualcun altro è stanco di ascoltarla,

translation.en: She died from a snake bite.
Her whole body just shut down.
We did everything we could, but we couldn't save her.
So we're gonna bury her tomorrow.
[Grizz] So, I'm gonna need a couple of guys.
translation.it: Mi servono un paio di persone.

translation.en: just woods that go on forever.
[in sign language] It's my house, too.
I never had just one day that was mine, until now.
translation.it: non ho mai avuto un giorno che fosse mio, fino ad ora.

translation.en: All right, give me the key,
[whispers] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.it: "Anche se vado per una valle oscura,

translation.en: I will fear no evil for thou art with me.
translation.it: non temo alcun male, perché tu sei con me.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me. My cup runneth over.
translation.it: Il tuo bastone e il tuo vincastro mi confortano. Il mio calice trabocca."
